pageProduct.name: Aleve 12 Hour 220mg 12 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Information

Aleve Anti-Inflammatory Fast-Acting 12 Hour Pain Relief tablets 12 pack

Aleve 12 hour tablets for fast-acting and long-lasting pain relief. Aleve provides temporary relief of pain associated with arthritis and oesteoarthritis and provides temporary relief of stiffness associated with osteoarthritis. One small convenient tablet provides pain relief that lasts for up to 12 hours. Aleve is anti-inflammatory and provides fast-acting relief from back pain, neck pain and shoulder & muscle pain. Take one small Aleve tablet for fast-acting pain relief that lasts up to 12 hours.

Key Features

  • - Provides fast-acting pain relief with one small tablet that lasts up to 12 hours.
  • - Pain relief with less tablets*
  • - Easy to swallow.
  • - Fast-acting and long-lasting pain relief.
  • - Anti-inflammatory relief.
  • - Naproxen is a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID).

*compared to leading Pharmacy Medicine (S2) analgesics

How does Aleve Work?

Aleve contains 220mg of the active ingredient Naproxen Sodium in each tablet. It works by temporarily blocking the body's production of naturally occurring chemicals called prostaglandins, resulting in reduced pain and inflammation.

Fast-acting pain relief from:

  • - Back pain
  • - Neck pain
  • - Shoulder & muscle pain
  • - Osteoarthritis/arthritis

Also provides temporary relief of stiffness associated with osteoarthritis.

What's the dosage?

Take 1 tablet with a glass of water every 8-12 hours as required. Take with food. Do not take more than 3 tablets a day.

Understand your back & muscle pain

Back and muscle pain can be caused by poor posture, prolonged sitting, lifting improperly, heavy backpacks, muscle sprains or strains, injury or trauma.

What you can do about it.

  • • Limit the rest to a few hours and no more than a couple of days.
  • • OTC pain medications can help relieve your minor pain.
  • • Use a cold compress or hot water bottle.
  • • Exercise or stretch your muscles.
  • • Maintain good posture.

Understand your knee pain

Your knees are among the most important joints in your body. They support your weight, provide stability and help keep your body moving. But there are plenty of ways to experience knee pain.

What you can do about it.

  • • Set up a treatment plan with your doctor involving exercises and stretching.
  • • OTC medications like Aleve can help relieve minor pain when used as directed.
  • • Compressing the area with bandages, in addition to applying ice 3-4 times a day for 10 minutes at a time, can keep swelling to a minimum.

Understand your shoulder pain

Your shoulders is the most moveable joints in the body, but also one of the most unstable. This is why so many people experience shoulder pain at some point.

What you can do about it

  • • Make sure you first consult your doctor.
  • • OTC medications like Aleve can help relieve minor pain when used as directed.
  • • Rest and try to avoid moving your shoulder in a way that makes it feel worse.
  • • Apply ice for 15-20 minutes a day can help relieve swelling.

General Information

Aleve 12 hour tablets provide fast acting pain relief that lasts for up to 12 hours with just one tablet

Choose Aleve tablets for fast-acting and long-lasting pain relief. One convenient tablet provides pain relief that last for up to 12 hours. Aleve is anti-inflammatory and provides fast-acting relief from back pain, neck pain and shoulder & muscle pain. Take one Aleve tablet for fast-acting pain relief that lasts up to 12 hours.
Key Features
- Provides fast-acting pain relief with one tablet that lasts up to 12 hours.
- Pain relief with less tablets compared to leading OTC analgesics.
- Easy to swallow.
- Fast-acting and long-lasting pain relief.
- Anti-inflammatory relief.
- Naproxen sodium is a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID).

Boxed Contents: 12 Tablets

Size: 12 Tablets

Warnings

Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Incorrect use could be harmful.

CAUTION

Do not use this product:
- In children under 12 years of age
- If you have a stomach ulcer, impaired kidney function or heart failure
- If you are allergic to naproxen or other anti-inflammatory medicines
- If you are in the last 3 months of pregnancy.
Unless your doctor has told you to, do not use this product:
- If you have asthma
- If you are trying to become pregnant or during the first 6 months of pregnancy
- With other products containing naproxen, aspirin or other anti-inflammatory medicines or with medicines that you are taking regularly.
Caution:
- If you get an allergic reaction, stop taking and see your doctor immediately
- Do not use for more than a few days at a time unless your doctor has told you to
- Do not exceed the recommended dose. Excessive use can be harmful and increase the risk of heart attack, stroke or liver damage
Do not use if the seal over the blister is broken.

Ingredients

Each tablet contains Naproxen Sodium 220mg

Directions

Adults and children 12 years and over: Take 1 tablet with a glass of water every 8-12 hours as required. For first dose, 2 tablets may be taken in first hour if required. Take with food. Do not take more than 3 tablets a day. If 65 years or over: do not take more than 2 tablets a day, except where directed by a doctor.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C. Protect from light.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
